armaments.name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
armaments.description: Obtained by defeating the boss in Castle Morne at the Weeping Penisula.

armaments.name: Marais Executioner's Sword
armaments.description: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar at The Shaded Castle.

armaments.name: Dark Moon Greatsword
armaments.description: Found below the Cathedral of Manus Celes at the end of Ranni's questline.

armaments.name: Eclipse Shotel
armaments.description: Found at the altar of the church at Castle Sol.

armaments.name: Devourer's Scepter
armaments.description: Dropped by invader npc at Crumbling Farum Azula.

armaments.name: Golden Order Greatsword
armaments.description: Dropped by Misbegotten Crusader in the Cave of the Forlorn.

armaments.name: Bolt of Gransax
armaments.description: Missable - Take the elevator down from the Erdtree Sanctuary grace, jump the ledge and climb the giant spear.

ashes.name: Mimic Tear
ashes.description: Missable - Take the elevator down from the Erdtree Sanctuary grace, jump the ledge and climb the giant spear.

ashes.name: Lhutel the Headless
ashes.description: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade at the Tombsward Catacombs.

ashes.name: Black Knife Tiche
ashes.description: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat at the Ringleader's Evergaol.

ashes.name: Redmane Knight Ogha
ashes.description: Dropped by the Putrid Tree Spirit in the War-Dead Catacombs.

ashes.name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff
ashes.description: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat at the Ringleader's Evergaol.

ashes.name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay
ashes.description: Obtained from a chest located at Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

sorceries.name: Greyoll's Roar
sorceries.description: Can be purchased after defeating Greyoll at the Dragon Communion Altar at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

sorceries.name: Flame of the Fell God
sorceries.description: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire.

sorceries.name: Elden Stars
sorceries.description: Looted from the ground in a cave at the Deeproot Depths.

sorceries.name: Founding Rain of Stars
sorceries.description: Inside a chest within Heretical Rise, in Mountaintops of the Giants.

sorceries.name: Ranni's Dark Moon
sorceries.description: Found in a chest at the top of Chelona's Rise.

sorceries.name: Comet Azur
sorceries.description: Acquired from Primeval Sorcerer Azur at the Hermit Village in Mt.Gelmir.

sorceries.name: Stars of Ruin
sorceries.description: Acquired from Master Lusat inside Sellia Hideaway.

talismans.name: Radagon Icon
talismans.description: Found inside a treasure chest on the second floor of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace.

talismans.name: Radagon's Soreseal
talismans.description: Found on a corpse at Fort Faroth.

talismans.name: Marika's Soreseal
talismans.description: Found on a corpse at Fort Faroth.

talismans.name: Godfrey Icon
talismans.description: Drops from Godefroy the Grafted found in Golden Lineage Evergaol.

talismans.name: Moon of Nokstella
talismans.description: Found in a chest underneath a massive throne in Nokstella, Eternal City.

talismans.name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
talismans.description: Found in a chest at Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree

talismans.name: Old Lord's Talisman
talismans.description: Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula.

talismans.name: Erdtree's Favor +2
talismans.description: Found on a dead tree in Leyndell, Ashen Capital
